meanings.definition: The quality of being on time.
meanings.sent1: Her punctuality at work impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: Punctuality is important for catching the bus.
meanings.sent3: His punctuality was so good, he arrived at the party before the host!
meanings.sent4: The train's punctuality was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The school emphasized the value of punctuality to the students.

meanings.definition: The habit of arriving or doing something at the scheduled time.
meanings.sent1: My friend's punctuality for our meetings is admirable.
meanings.sent2: Punctuality is key for a successful business.
meanings.sent3: The cat's punctuality for dinner time was uncanny.
meanings.sent4: The punctuality of the flowers blooming in spring is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: Her punctuality in completing tasks set a high standard for the team.
